main_topic.author: AlphaTT30
main_topic.title: Can we use external data that contain other model's responses excluding  those in  the competition data?
main_topic.content: Is there any restriction to use the other model's responses that are not in the competition data? Or can we use any model's responses?

comments.author: Valentin Werner
comments.content: Just need to make sure data is available open source. Good luck!
